title: S3 Ep12: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 7 – Absence of Evidence

description:
August 23, 2018 / Jon Cryer hosts this addendum discussing updates from the Episode 7 on the Dennis Perry case.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Handy.

To get your first 3 hour cleaning for $39 when you sign up for a plan, visit www.handy.com/undisclosed and use promo code UNDISCLOSED during checkout!
